conversation.message: We are delighted you asked about our daily schedule! Outdoor activity is a cornerstone of our philosophy. Typically, children have structured outdoor playtime twice daily (morning and afternoon) for a total of at least 90 minutes, weather permitting. This includes dedicated time in our natural playground focusing on exploration, gross motor skill development, and gardening projects. We also frequently incorporate outdoor elements into learning activities, such as nature walks and observational drawing. We believe strongly that time outside supports holistic development. Do you have any further questions about our pedagogical approach?
